sentence: Supporters of the bill said making the change would prevent Democrats or independent voters from casting a ballot in the Republican primary presumably, voters who would be more likely to favor Cheney, who voted to impeach Trump and who sits on the House panel investigating the Jan. 6, 2021, insurrection at the U.S. Capitol, over Harriet Hageman (R), Trump's chosen challenger.
author: Reid Wilson -
title: Wyoming legislature kills crossover voting ban despite Trump's support
